title: GenAI Lead Engineer
description:
Engineering at TRACTIANThe Engineering team at TRACTIAN is at the forefront of developing cutting-edge infrastructure, technologies, and products to harness the power of IoT data. Our team of talented engineers collaborates to build robust systems, innovative solutions, and scalable platforms that drive TRACTIAN's success. We are instrumental in shaping the company's decision-making process, optimizing operational efficiency, and delivering exceptional experiences to our customers.What will you doAs a GenAI Lead Engineer, you will play a pivotal role within the Software Team, collaborating closely with developers, engineers, and product teams to drive project organization, scheduling, and successful deployments. Your leadership will ensure smooth coordination across various departments to achieve objectives and complete assigned tasks effectively. This role involves managing multiple moving parts and offers the opportunity to engage in diverse aspects of the Software Team's work. You will be instrumental in streamlining processes, enhancing team efficiency, and directly contributing to the company's overall success.
Responsibilities

Lead Projects: Plan, schedule, and deliver software projects on time and at the highest quality.Build Teams: Manage and mentor developers, fostering collaboration and high performance.Drive Strategy: Make key decisions on backend architecture, scalability, and infrastructure.Collaborate Cross-Functionally: Align software, product, engineering, and department goals for seamless execution.Optimize Processes: Streamline workflows, solve technical challenges, and improve productivity.Oversee Deployments: Ensure smooth, efficient deployments and system performance.
Requirements

8+ years in backend development specializing in scalable system design, API architecture (DDD), and microservices (gRPC, REST), with expertise in databases (Postgres, MongoDB, Redis, Clickhouse) and cloud infrastructure (AWS).Proficient in TypeScript and Golang, with extensive testing experience (unit, end-to-end, and load testing using Cypress, Playwright, k6).Skilled in containerization (Docker, Kubernetes) and DevOps practices, including CI/CD pipelines, infrastructure as code (IaC), and system monitoring (Datadog, Grafana).Experienced in developing and optimizing LLM applications, including Retrieval-Augmented Generation (RAG) and GPT-based solutions, with strong knowledge of deployment patterns, prompt engineering, and API integration (OpenAI, Anthropic, Gemini).Proficient in ML frameworks (PyTorch), optimization techniques (quantization, model distillation), and vector databases (pgvector, Weaviate, Pinecone).Experienced with LLM inference stacks (TensorRT-LLM, VLLM, llama.cpp) and developing RAG systems.Proven ability to hire, mentor, and lead high-performing technical teams while setting technical direction and delivering impactful backend projects.Strong track record of leading full development lifecycles, managing issue tracking (Linear), and delivering complex backend systems on time.Strong problem-solving and analytical skills, with excellent communication to foster cross-functional collaboration and stakeholder alignment.Experience in startups or high-growth environments, with deep expertise in system optimization tools and processes.Bachelor's degree in Computer Science or Engineering.CompensationCompetitive SalaryPremium Medical, Dental, and Vision CoveragePaid Time Off (PTO): 15 Days401(k) Retirement PlanLanguage Learning Opportunities - Take advantage of optional, fully funded Portuguese or Spanish courses to enhance your skills and global reach.Birthday Time Off - Celebrate your birthday with a paid day off during your birthday week.Gympass Membership - Access a wide range of gyms and training programs.Sports Incentive - Receive a monthly bonus when you regularly participate in physical activities.Long-Term Benefit - After four years of service, earn a fully funded trip anywhere in the world.

GenAI Lead Engineer

Central - Austin, TX

Full Time Senior-level / Expert USD 145K - 270K *
  • Website
  • LinkedIn
  • Search

Tractian

Meet the most comprehensive system on the market and avoid failures, reduce costs, and increase your industry's productivity! Condition monitoring sensors, predictive maintenance software, and asset management.

View all jobs at Tractian

Apply now Apply later

Posted 8 hours ago

Engineering at TRACTIAN
The Engineering team at TRACTIAN is at the forefront of developing cutting-edge infrastructure, technologies, and products to harness the power of IoT data. Our team of talented engineers collaborates to build robust systems, innovative solutions, and scalable platforms that drive TRACTIAN's success. We are instrumental in shaping the company's decision-making process, optimizing operational efficiency, and delivering exceptional experiences to our customers.
What will you do
As a GenAI Lead Engineer, you will play a pivotal role within the Software Team, collaborating closely with developers, engineers, and product teams to drive project organization, scheduling, and successful deployments. Your leadership will ensure smooth coordination across various departments to achieve objectives and complete assigned tasks effectively. This role involves managing multiple moving parts and offers the opportunity to engage in diverse aspects of the Software Team's work. You will be instrumental in streamlining processes, enhancing team efficiency, and directly contributing to the company's overall success.

Responsibilities

  • Lead Projects: Plan, schedule, and deliver software projects on time and at the highest quality.
  • Build Teams: Manage and mentor developers, fostering collaboration and high performance.
  • Drive Strategy: Make key decisions on backend architecture, scalability, and infrastructure.
  • Collaborate Cross-Functionally: Align software, product, engineering, and department goals for seamless execution.
  • Optimize Processes: Streamline workflows, solve technical challenges, and improve productivity.
  • Oversee Deployments: Ensure smooth, efficient deployments and system performance.

Requirements

  • 8+ years in backend development specializing in scalable system design, API architecture (DDD), and microservices (gRPC, REST), with expertise in databases (Postgres, MongoDB, Redis, Clickhouse) and cloud infrastructure (AWS).
  • Proficient in TypeScript and Golang, with extensive testing experience (unit, end-to-end, and load testing using Cypress, Playwright, k6).
  • Skilled in containerization (Docker, Kubernetes) and DevOps practices, including CI/CD pipelines, infrastructure as code (IaC), and system monitoring (Datadog, Grafana).
  • Experienced in developing and optimizing LLM applications, including Retrieval-Augmented Generation (RAG) and GPT-based solutions, with strong knowledge of deployment patterns, prompt engineering, and API integration (OpenAI, Anthropic, Gemini).
  • Proficient in ML frameworks (PyTorch), optimization techniques (quantization, model distillation), and vector databases (pgvector, Weaviate, Pinecone).
  • Experienced with LLM inference stacks (TensorRT-LLM, VLLM, llama.cpp) and developing RAG systems.
  • Proven ability to hire, mentor, and lead high-performing technical teams while setting technical direction and delivering impactful backend projects.
  • Strong track record of leading full development lifecycles, managing issue tracking (Linear), and delivering complex backend systems on time.
  • Strong problem-solving and analytical skills, with excellent communication to foster cross-functional collaboration and stakeholder alignment.
  • Experience in startups or high-growth environments, with deep expertise in system optimization tools and processes.
  • Bachelor's degree in Computer Science or Engineering.
Compensation
Competitive SalaryPremium Medical, Dental, and Vision CoveragePaid Time Off (PTO): 15 Days401(k) Retirement PlanLanguage Learning Opportunities - Take advantage of optional, fully funded Portuguese or Spanish courses to enhance your skills and global reach.Birthday Time Off - Celebrate your birthday with a paid day off during your birthday week.Gympass Membership - Access a wide range of gyms and training programs.Sports Incentive - Receive a monthly bonus when you regularly participate in physical activities.Long-Term Benefit - After four years of service, earn a fully funded trip anywhere in the world.
Apply now Apply later

* Salary range is an estimate based on our AI, ML, Data Science Salary Index ðŸ’°
